directions: [["Prepare the roast by removing any large pieces of fat and chopping into 2-inch cubes."],["In a blender, blend together puree ingredients. Puree until smooth."],["Add pot ingredients to Instant Pot. "],["Cover beef with puree. "],["Cook at high pressure for 60 minutes."],["Shred meat and return to remaining liquid. Serve and enjoy!"],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
